```{r, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse=TRUE,
  comment="#>",
  eval=FALSE
)
```

First run `import.Rmd` to get `cluster.ok`, a list of STAR objects.

```{r, child="import.Rmd"}
```

Then export into subdirectories, either inside the same directory as the STAR
templates or inside the `mnt/star-templates` area:

```{r}
## topdir <- file.path(star.dir, "csv")
topdir <- "mnt/star-templates/2021/WGSAD_Western_Mediterranean"
sapply(cluster.ok, write.star, topdir=topdir, force=TRUE)
```
